name: COVID_19DisordersSNOMED
title: COVID_19 (Disorders) (SNOMED)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has 2019 novel coronavirus infection regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: coronavirus),(Exclusion Criteria: NA)
